subject: Horse Racing
Jockeys, Drivers and Trainers
Belmont Stakes
Triple Crown (Horse Racing)
American Pharoah (Race Horse)
lead_paragraph: The trainer Todd Pletcher hopes his willingness to skip the Preakness will give him the edge he needs to deny American Pharoah a Belmont Stakes victory.
snippet: The trainer Todd Pletcher hopes his willingness to skip the Preakness will give him the edge he needs to deny American Pharoah a Belmont Stakes victory.
